amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for the Ryan White title IV program by $3.5 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase appropriations for the Department of Health and Human Services (by transfer) by $3,500,000, to be taken from the Center for Disease Control, Research, and Training Department account.

action.text: Amendment (A012) offered by Ms. Wasserman Schultz.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wasserman Schultz amendment (A012) Agreed to by voice vote.
